Uses of Interface
org.jscience.technical.backend.ExecutionContext

Packages that use ExecutionContext
Package
Description
org.jscience.mathematics.linearalgebra.backends
 
org.jscience.mathematics.linearalgebra.tensors.backends
 
org.jscience.technical.backend
package provides a Service Provider Interface (SPI) for implementing compute backends (CPU, GPU, quantum, etc.) while hiding implementation details from users.
org.jscience.technical.backend.cpu
package provides the default CPU backend using pure Java.
org.jscience.technical.backend.cuda
 
org.jscience.technical.backend.opencl
